alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Grant; Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 4:47PM CDT until May 02 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Southeastern Grant County in northern Oklahoma... Northeastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 447 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Lamont, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Blackwell, Tonkawa, Pond Creek, Lamont, Hunter, Deer Creek, Jefferson, Nardin and Peckham. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
